Eric Shen

Software Engineer, Problem Solver, Teacher, and Lifelong Learner

Welcome!

I'm Eric, and I'm currently a Software Engineer at Airtable, based out of their NYC office.

Before joining Airtable, I was a Software Engineer at Dropbox NYC. I graduated from UC Berkeley in May 2016 with a degree in Electrial Engineering and Computer Sciences.

In my free time, I love to play soccer, run, travel, and explore new restaurants.

You can contact me at eric@ericshen.com.
